entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain or snow changing to snow this evening and ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening then northwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
